snippet: The layoffs equaled less than 10 percent of the work force. USA Today is the flagship paper of the Gannett Company.
abstract: Gannett Company's flagship newspaper USA Today lays off roughly 70 people from its newsroom and business staff, under 10 percent of its total work force.
lead_paragraph: The layoffs equaled less than 10 percent of the work force. USA Today is the flagship paper of the Gannett Company.

headline.main: USA Today Cuts 70 Employees From Newsroom and Business Staff
headline.print_headline: USA Today Cuts 70 Employees From Newsroom and Business Staff
